text: Robert Michael Iler (born March 2, 1985) is an American actor and poker player. He is best known for playing the role of Anthony "A. J." Soprano Jr. in the HBO series The Sopranos (1999â€“2007). In 2019, he started hosting the podcast Pajama Pants alongside The Sopranos co-star Jamie-Lynn Sigler and comedian Kassem G. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from New York City Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Podcasters Category:Poker players
